rules.name: Fly
rules.description: The Character may ove over terrain features unhindered.

rules.name: Pack Hunter
rules.description: Up to three of the same Character with this Trait may be Activated at the same time. In addition, they may re-roll a single failed Hit each if they attack the same target.

rules.name: Leader of the Pack
rules.description: A Character with this Traid may allow Beasts within 8" to use their Bravery stat.

rules.name: Fearsome
rules.description: Any enemy character on a smaller base size within 3" of this Character must take an automatic Bravery Test.

rules.name: Agile
rules.description: A Character with this Trait may re-roll a single failed Leg It roll per Round.
